edge: Sardar Udham is a song-less film, meaning its soundtrack only features instrumental compositions curated and composed by Shantanu Moitra, which were produced by George Joseph and recorded during the COVID-19 lockdown period in June 2020.
Shantanu Moitra curated and composed the six instrumental compositions used in the soundtrack for Sardar Udham.
George Joseph produced the six instrumental compositions used in the soundtrack for Sardar Udham, which were recorded during the COVID-19 lockdown period in June 2020.
The soundtrack for Sardar Udham, featuring six instrumental compositions curated and composed by Shantanu Moitra and produced by George Joseph, was released by Zee Music Company on 2 October 2021.
